posts.post_content: it's a 6/4 for 7 mana. it's not a good deal--even for an artifact creature. not anymore at least. yes, it has funny flavor text. but please, don't give this a high rating merely based on that. i've never known flavor text to win duels and i doubt this will be the card to start such a trend.

Posted By: Eternal_Blue (9/25/2010 2:05:22 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Horrible card.
  
   
Compare it to an Obsi\*\*\* Golem, and it simply loses. Yeah, it is a 6/4 vs. a 4/6, but for 1 more mana it's not worth it.
  
   
For a really sick feeling, compare it to Wurmcoil Engine?! A difference in commonality should not equal that much of a difference in power level, IMHO. Watching newbies field this drek only to die to $30 mythic rare replacements is rather depressing.
posts.html:
Horrible card.
